Package task1

Class MetroStationWithFile

java.lang.Object
task1.AbstractMetroStation
task1.MetroStationWithCollection
task1.MetroStationWithList
task1.MetroStationWithFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetroStationWithBinaryFile, MetroStationWithBinarySerialization, MetroStationWithTextFile
public abstract class MetroStationWithFile extends MetroStationWithList
The MetroStationWithFile class is a base class that declares read and write operations and implements the ability to demonstrate interaction with files of different formats. This class is inherited from the MetroStationWithList.

  • Method Details

    • writeToFile

      public abstract void writeToFile(String fileName) throws Exception
      Writes Metro Station and Operating Hours data to a given file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file name for writing data;
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while writing or processing data.

    • readFromFile

      public abstract void readFromFile(String fileName) throws Exception
      Reads Metro Station and Operating Hours data from a given file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file name for reading data;
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while reading or processing data from a file.

    • testWithFile

      public void testWithFile(String MSWithHoursFile, String MSWithoutHoursFile, String SortedByRidershipFile, String SortedByCommentFile)
      Test interaction (read and write operations) with files of different formats.
      Parameters:
      MSWithHoursFile - the file to store the data of the class object with the operating hours;
      MSWithoutHoursFile - the file to store the data of the class object without the operating hours;
      SortedByCommentFile - the file to store the data of the class object sorted by descending comment length;
      SortedByRidershipFile - the file to store the data of the class object sorted by decreasing ridership.
